title: 1.13.2execute指令问题
author: Rays_Beam
txt_content:
请问如何通过execute检测红石灯是否亮起？
版本是1.13.2版本是1.13.2版本是1.13.2 java版
谢谢啦~

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
/execute if block 67 4 -270 minecraft:redstone_lamp[lit=true] run command
坐标改成目标坐标即可

replies.author: Rays_Beam
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2019-8-11 11:58
/execute if block 67 4 -270 minecraft:redstone_lamp[lit=true] run command
坐标改成目标坐标即可
 ...
谢谢啦~~
